name: Polyglot
overview: Multi-language metadata support through library mirroring with hardlinks.
description: Serve your Jellyfin library in multiple languages without duplicating files. Creates language-specific mirror libraries using hardlinks, allowing different users to see different metadata languages. Supports LDAP integration for automatic language assignment based on group membership.

## What's Changed

### üîÑ Refactoring
- Implement IConfigurationService for atomic configuration updates
  - Introduced `IConfigurationService` to manage configuration changes atomically, preventing race conditions and stale references
  - Refactored services and controllers to use centralized configuration access, ensuring thread safety and consistency
  - Added deep cloning methods to models for safe configuration handling

### üîß Improvements
- Updated plugin uninstallation to use `IConfigurationService` for clearing configuration
- Enhanced logging for configuration operations to improve traceability and debugging

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Maronato/jellyfin-plugin-polyglot/compare/v0.8.6...v0.8.7

## What's Changed

### ‚ú® New Features
- Add UI configuration endpoints to PolyglotController
  - Introduced `GetUIConfig` and `UpdateUIConfig` methods to manage plugin UI settings
  - Enhanced response structure to include libraries, users, cultures, countries, LDAP status, and server configuration
  - Updated front-end JavaScript to load and render UI data from the new API endpoints
  - Implemented change detection for settings and LDAP integration in the configuration page

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Maronato/jellyfin-plugin-polyglot/compare/v0.8.5...v0.8.6

  - Changed `UpdateConfiguration` back to `SaveConfiguration` for proper configuration handling

## What's Changed

### üîß Improvements
- Enhance SaveConfiguration method with deep cloning for Jellyfin compatibility
  - Updated the `SaveConfiguration` method to create a deep clone of the configuration using JSON serialization before updating
  - Ensures compliance with Jellyfin's configuration API, which requires the entire configuration object to be replaced rather than modified in-place
  - Added debug logging to track references and mirror counts before and after configuration updates, improving diagnostics

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Maronato/jellyfin-plugin-polyglot/compare/v0.8.3...v0.8.4

## What's Changed

### üîß Improvements
- Add JellyfinCompatibility helper for version compatibility
  - Manages compatibility between Jellyfin versions 10.10.x and 10.11+
  - Handles property name changes via reflection for `TaskTriggerInfo` creation
- Enhance debug logging in PolyglotController for better diagnostics
  - Added comprehensive debug logging in `GetAlternatives` and `AddLibraryMirror` methods
  - Included details such as plugin instance hash, configuration hash, and mirror counts to aid in troubleshooting
- Enhance DebugReportService to handle plugin enumeration errors
  - Wrapped the plugin enumeration logic in a try-catch block to gracefully handle exceptions
  - Returns a placeholder `PluginSummaryInfo` when enumeration is unavailable, improving user feedback

### üîÑ Refactoring
- Update `SaveConfiguration` method to use `UpdateConfiguration` for improved clarity and maintainability

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Maronato/jellyfin-plugin-polyglot/compare/v0.8.2...v0.8.3
